description_html:
Collection Story
Bosley gets its symbolic character in large part from a smooth-running, wrap-around frame that traces the collection’s slick outline. The quality is unmistakable—sit down for even a moment and you’ll fall in love with the way your skin grazes the solid wood arms of this swanky and faithful tribute to the past.

How It Is Made
High-end, solid wood build with modern design lines.
Solid mahogany frame and legs finished in our vintage Cordovan finish.
Upholstered in durable 100% Olefin basketweave fabric.

Details & Dimensions
DIMENSIONS

Overall Dimensions: 33.5"H x 84"W x 31.5"D
Seat Cushion: 6"H x 25.75"W x 29"D
Interior Seating: 77.25"W x 19"D
Arm Height: 26.25"
Leg Height: 8.25"
Diagonal Clearance: 34"
Seats up to: 3
CUSHIONS

Cushion filling is 30% Feather Down / 70% Polyfiber wrapped around a foam core.
Foam Type: Polyethylene
Seats up to: 3
